testcase.name: Check if the user can register successfully through email OTP authentication
testcase.system-out: Given user launches the InstaBee portal on browser..........................passed And user lands on registration page by clicking the try InstaBee free button.passed And user enters the name....................................................passed And user enters the email...................................................passed And user enters the mobile..................................................passed And user enters the password................................................passed And user enters the confirm password........................................passed And user hit submit registration button.....................................passed And user lands on the 2FA page..............................................passed And user gets OTP from the email for registration...........................passed And user enters the OTP and hit submit......................................passed Then user should land on home page successfully.............................passed

testcase.name: Check if the user can login using the email & password successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user launches the InstaBee portal on browser..........................passed And user lands on login page by clicking the login button...................passed And user enters email on the login page.....................................passed And user enters password on the login page..................................passed And user clicks submit login button on the login page.......................passed Then user should land on home page successfully.............................passed

testcase.name: Check if the user can login using the gmail email & password successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user launches the InstaBee portal on browser..........................passed And user lands on login page by clicking the login button...................passed And user clicks the gmail login button......................................passed And user enters the gmail email and hit next................................passed And user enters the gmail password..........................................passed And user hit submit.........................................................passed Then user should land on home page successfully.............................passed

testcase.name: Check if the user can login using mobile OTP
testcase.system-out: Given user launches the InstaBee portal on browser..........................passed And user lands on login page by clicking the login button...................passed And user clicks the login with OTP button...................................passed And user enters the valid phone number registered with the player and hit verify.passed And user gets OTP from the email for login..................................passed And user enters the OTP and hit submit......................................passed Then user should land on home page successfully.............................passed

testcase.name: Check if the user can successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user launches the InstaBee portal on browser..........................passed And user lands on login page by clicking the login button...................passed And user enters email on the login page.....................................passed And user enters password on the login page..................................passed And user clicks submit login button on the login page.......................passed And user should land on home page successfully..............................passed And user clicks the options menu............................................passed And user clicks sign out button.............................................passed Then user gets logged out successfully......................................passed

testcase.name: Check if the user can use 2FA login feature by toggle ON from profile page. Also can disable the same from profile page
testcase.system-out: Given user launches the InstaBee portal on browser..........................passed And user lands on login page by clicking the login button...................passed And user enters email on the login page.....................................passed And user enters password on the login page..................................passed And user clicks submit login button on the login page.......................passed Then user should land on home page successfully.............................passed And user clicks the options menu............................................passed And user opens the profile page.............................................passed And user click enable 2FA button............................................passed And user enter password to confirm 2FA popup................................passed And user hit submit button to confirm 2FA popup.............................passed Then user is show with QA code, field to enter the auth code and confirm button.passed

testcase.classname: Validate user profile page and update personal details
testcase.name: Check if all the sections on profile page are loaded and user can update personla info
testcase.system-out: Given user launches the InstaBee portal on browser..........................passed And user lands on login page by clicking the login button...................passed And user enters email on the login page.....................................passed And user enters password on the login page..................................passed And user clicks submit login button on the login page.......................passed And user should land on home page successfully..............................passed And user clicks the options menu............................................passed And user opens the profile page.............................................passed Then profile info section is present on profile page........................passed And update password section is present on profile page......................passed And 2FA section is present on profile page..................................passed And broswer sessions section is present on profile page.....................passed And delete account section is present on profile page.......................passed And user updates profile information on profile info section................passed And user clicks the options menu............................................passed And user clicks logout link.................................................passed And user lands on login page by clicking the login button...................passed And user enters the updated email on the login page.........................passed And user enters password on the login page..................................passed And user clicks submit login button on the login page.......................passed Then user should land on home page successfully.............................passed

testcase.name: Check if the user can change password successfully through forgot password flow
testcase.system-out: Given user launches the InstaBee portal on browser..........................passed And user lands on login page by clicking the login button...................passed And user clicks forgot password link........................................passed And user lands on forgot password rest email sending page...................passed And user enters emails and hit submit.......................................passed And password reset email sent successfully..................................passed And user lands on password reset page by following link in email............passed And user enters email, password and confirm password on password reset page.passed And user clicks reset password button.......................................passed Then player lands on login page and password reset successfully message is shown.passed And user enters email on the login page.....................................passed And user enters new password on the login page..............................passed And user clicks submit login button on the login page.......................passed Then user should land on home page successfully.............................passed

testcase.name: Check if the user can change password from profile page and re-login with new password
testcase.system-out: Given user launches the InstaBee portal on browser..........................passed And user lands on login page by clicking the login button...................passed And user enters email on the login page.....................................passed And user enters new password on the login page..............................passed And user clicks submit login button on the login page.......................passed And user should land on home page successfully..............................passed And user clicks the options menu............................................passed And user opens the profile page.............................................passed And user enters the current password on update password section.............passed And user enters the new password on update password section.................passed And user enters the confirm password on the update password section.........passed And user hits save button...................................................passed And user clicks the options menu............................................passed And user clicks logout link.................................................passed And user lands on login page by clicking the login button...................passed And user enters email on the login page.....................................passed And user enters password on the login page..................................passed And user clicks submit login button on the login page.......................passed Then user should land on home page successfully.............................passed
